sample_crystals.content:

And there you have it‚Äîthe full arc of Post-Labor Economics distilled into six steps, from automation‚Äôs relentless climb to a vision of liberated human potential. But let‚Äôs be real: this blog post is the highly truncated version, barely scratching the surface of years of digging through thousands of pages across hundreds of sources.
